適應症: 發育不良、營養補給、虛弱體質、熱性消耗性疾患之補助治療、妊娠婦之營養補給。
主成分略述: MANGANESE (GLUCONATE), CHROMIC (SULFATE), SELENIUM (YEAST), PHOSPHORUS (DICALCIUM PHOSPHATE), CALCIUM (DICALCIUM PHOSPHATE), MAGNESIUM (OXIDE), CHOLINE BITARTRATE, CHOLINE FERRIC CITRATE, IODINE (KELP), VITAMIN A (PALMITATE), BIOTIN, NIACINAMIDE (NICOTINAMIDE), VITAMIN B1 (MONONITRATE), RIBOFLAVIN (VIT B2), PYRIDOXINE(VITAMIN B6), VITAMIN B12 (CYANOCOBALAMIN 1%), FOLIC ACID, PANTOTHENATE (D- CALCIUM), INOSITOL (MESO-INOSITOL), PARA-AMINOBENZOIC ACID (VIT H1), ASCORBIC ACID (VIT C), VIT D (CHOLECALCIFEROL), VITAMIN E (SUCCINATE ALPHA D-), RUTIN, MOLYBDATE (SODIUM DIHYDRATE), ZINC (GLUCONATE)
申請商地址: 台中巿中區中山路９６號２樓
